name: jsPacman
description: JavaScript DOM based remake of the classic Ms. Pac-Man game

scripts.build: npm run clean && dotenv node scripts/build.js
scripts.demo:publish: npm run test && npm run build && cd dist && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update demo' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -m 'Update demo' && git push git@github.com:8tentaculos/jsPacman.git gh-pages --force
